EmailTemplate.name: Inactive Account Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Warm Greetings from Hirect
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Account.Name},
Your Subscription has been expired and account is marked as Inactive due to continuous inactivity for more than 7 days. Please subscribe to any of the plans to start using the services
Hire Instantly for Your Startup.
Best Wishes {!User.Name}
